dmca.title: My Owl Photo
dmca.body:
Unfortunately, my copyright stamp was removed from my image. However you can clearly
see it on the original:
http://www.animalpicturesarchive.com/view.php?tid=1&did=142307

This is really a simple matter. I want the person /company to either pay me $500.00
for using my image that they are selling on shirts or remove my image from their
websites (hosted by your company). If this is not done within a reasonable time, I
will be forced to escalate matters.

Best Regards,

John White
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Legal Response 
  To: john.white161@verizon.net 
  Cc: Theplanet@chillingeffects.org 
  Sent: Monday, March 27, 2006 10:24 AM
  Subject: FW: My Owl Photo


  To Whom It May Concern:

   

  Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

   

  Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

   

  Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.

   

  Legal Response Team

  THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.




------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  From: John White [mailto:john.white161@verizon.net] 
  Sent: Sunday, March 26, 2006 3:15 PM
  To: admin@crazytees.com
  Cc: copyright@theplanet.com; abuse@theplanet.com; legal-response@theplanet.com
  Subject: My Owl Photo


  You are using my snowy owl (O RLY) photo without my permission.
(http://www.crazytees.com/home.php) If you would like to continue using my photo
it will cost you $500.

  Best Regards,

  John White

  ______________________________________________________________________

  Registrant:

  8864 S. Western
